hero.name: I'm Muhammad Fiaz.
hero.subtitle: Mobile App Developer
hero.description: Aspiring Mobile Application Developer with a strong foundation in information technology and hands-on experience in Flutter, Dart, and Firebase. Passionate about building intuitive applications that solve meaningful problems.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a Mobile App Developer skilled in developing user-centric applications with a focus on performance, usability, and real-world impact. I have a proven ability to lead teams and deliver innovative mobile solutions through academic and professional projects.
about.description2: I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.

experience.role: Mobile App Developer (FeynLearn – AI-Powered Learning App)
experience.description: Developed an educational mobile application utilizing Flutter, Dart, and Firebase to assist students in understanding complex concepts through AI-driven content summarization and interactive tools. Improved student engagement by 40% and reduced average study time by 60%.

experience.role: Student & Team Lead (Craftfolio – Resume Builder Mobile App)
experience.description: Led a team of 4 junior developers, achieving 100% milestone achievement and a perfect score in the final project evaluation. Reduced Firebase read/write latency by 30% through code refactoring and backend optimization.

projects.title: FeynLearn – AI-Powered Learning App
projects.subtitle: An AI-powered app for smarter, faster learning.
projects.description: An application that aids students in breaking down study materials into manageable content, generating summaries, flashcards, and quizzes with AI-driven interactive experiences.

projects.title: Craftfolio – Resume Builder App
projects.subtitle: Build professional resumes in minutes.
projects.description: A mobile app enabling users to build professional resumes with personalized templates in under 5 minutes using guided input forms and real-time validation.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
